item.title: Andy Higgs
item.description: The Brum Tech Scene Interviews are a series of video conversations with interesting and enlightening people involved with technology in some way in Birmingham. This discussion is with Andy Higgs, co-founder of the Badego design group and Akkroo.
item.dc:creator: Stuart Langridge

item.title: Jess Rose
item.description: The Brum Tech Scene Interviews are a series of video conversations with interesting and enlightening people involved with technology in some way in Birmingham. This discussion is with Jess Rose, founder of Birmingham Open Code and Ladies Who Code Birmingham.
item.dc:creator: Stuart Langridge

item.title: Bruce Lawson
item.description: The Brum Tech Scene Interviews are a series of video conversations with interesting and enlightening people involved with technology in some way in Birmingham. This discussion is with Bruce Lawson, open standards advocate for the Opera web browser.
item.dc:creator: Stuart Langridge

item.title: Simon Jenner
item.description: The Brum Tech Scene Interviews are a series of video conversations with interesting and enlightening people involved with technology in some way in Birmingham. Our inaugural interview is with Simon Jenner, head of Oxygen Startups and co-founder of Silicon Canal.
item.dc:creator: Stuart Langridge

item.title: Stuart Langridge
item.description: An introduction to the Brum Tech Scene interviews, by Stuart Langridge.
item.dc:creator: Stuart Langridge
